https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fe41JBU3fz88AIjr0mk2NT4yJUj.jpg Diasporadical Trilog√¨a follows the story of a woman who mysteriously lived on three different continents at the same time. Through a magical realism lens, she shares her memories of growing up as a little girl in Brooklyn, a young lady in Accra and a middle aged woman in Bahia, while struggling with love, immigration and gentrification.
